channel.title: Tutorrrial on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorrrial on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.title: Taxonomy
item.description: Th' Relearrrn theme supports Hugo’s default taxonomies tag an' category out o' th' box. Configurat'n Just add tags and/or categories t' any plank. They can be given as a single str'n or an array o' str'ns. ​ toml yaml json +++ categories = ['taxonomy', 'content'] tags = 'tutorial' title = 'Taxonomy' +++ --- categories: - taxonomy - rrrambl'n tags: tutorial title: Taxonomy --- { "categories": [ "taxonomy", "content" ], "tags": "tutorial", "title": "Taxonomy" } Behavior Th' tags be displayed at th' top o' th' plank 'n alphabetical order.
